title: What is something that people still do often that is old fashioned? - Quora

response.answer_text: Use pen and paper. Mend clothes. Talk to their neighbours/be involved in their local community Go to a book store/library. Or the travel agents. Or the bank. Look things up in an encyclopedia, rather than google. Have newspapers as their sole source of news. Listen to the radio. Buy CDs, or even vinyl records. Play board games.
People say old fashioned things and don’y even realize it. Here’s 2 that I can think of now. The “dial” a phone. They use “Upper case” letters.
